cause.description:
Emergency shelter for homeless, abused and runaway youth ages 10-17; crisis intervention and counseling services to youth ages 0-17 and their families; community outreach and prevention programs including Safe Place. Adding a long-term housing facility for youth ages 16-21.
24-hour crisis hotline: 1-800-568-7776 (North Central Texas)
1. youth should be safe from abuse in their home
cause.name: North Texas Youth Connection (Grayson Co. Juvenile Alternatives)
